label: bike
caption: A rugged, asphalt road stretches out before him as he revs up his powerful motorcycle, the engine roaring to life beneath him. The man in a sleek black and white helmet and jacket stands poised on the back of the bike, his knees slightly bent in anticipation of the stunt he's about to perform. A small crowd is gathered at the edge of the road, eagerly watching as he prepares to take off with a burst of speed and adrenaline.
